messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

ref servers belgrade to fix for security vulnerabilities sent monday march ref servers belgrade fix for vulnerabilities hi several belgrade servers have identified having serious vulnerabilities attached report can you help fixing these vulnerabilities moment can connect servers below check them out can you please let know how connect fix these vulnerabilities or something you can work looking forward your thanks technical consultant ext
